title: Search Campaign Hiearchy Detail
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Campaign Hierarchy Details

xdm:accountId.title: Account ID
xdm:accountId.description: Unique identifier for the account this event is associated with.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign ID
xdm:campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the campaign which this event is associated with.

xdm:adgroupId.title: AdGroup ID
xdm:adgroupId.description: Unique identifier for the adgroup which this event is associated with.

xdm:termId.title: Search Term ID
xdm:termId.description: Unique identifier for the search term which this event is associated with.

xdm:advertiserId.title: Advertiser ID
xdm:advertiserId.description: Unique identifier for the advertiser which this event is associated with.

xdm:creativeId.title: Ad ID
xdm:creativeId.description: Unique identifier for the creative or ad which this event is associated with.

xdm:sid.title: Search Engine ID
xdm:sid.description: Unique identifier for the Search Engine which this event is associated with.
